title: kOyilukkellAm
sahitya:
kOyilukkellAm engaL kOmaLavalli kuvalaya rANikkE


anupallavi

  nEya mighundiDum tUyavar angattil nittiya muktarin sattiya sangattil


caraNam    engum uDal koNDulAvum uyirilE iyarkkaip-
tangum malaiyinil tavam vaLar guhaiyinil tavazhum nadiyinilE 
tingaLirp-pongum tirai kaDal veLLattil shen kadir uLLattilE 
mangalamAga viLangiDum annai mahAshakti gauri manOnmaNi ammaiyin
